On the user roles page admin/config/people/roles we have a button at the bottom labeled Save Roles. This button saves everything on the page -- not just the roles. We've recently moved addition...

Another Open Source Day mentor is working on this issue. But, no Pull Request yet.
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4522

Do not capitalize the word "Date" in the OOTB date formats · Issue #4522 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
I'm annoyed by the fact that the word "Date" is being capitalized in the labels of the existing OOTB date formats; can we fix those (for new sites only - in system.date.json)?

We've been told that 30 people are registered for Open Source Day on Thursday to specifically work on Backdrop CMS. We've also been advised that in the past, roughly 50% don't show up on the actual day of the event. But, that still leaves 15 potential new contributors in our issue queue on Thursday.

Let's be as supportive and encouraging as possible. Also, let's make sure that the issues tagged "Good First Issue" are good issues for a first time contributor and keep them up to date.

There are at least three OSD mentors that are already exploring the issue queue and filing pull requests.
Are the mentors working on the "Good First Issues"?
Yes, so far they seem to be focused on issues with that tag.

I just wrote a welcome post with links and resources. Feedback wanted.
https://backdropcms.org/news/open-source-day-getting-started
